long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Krunker IO is a shooter game with online for free game is available in the chrome web store just install it and play Krunker IO online for free game.

Krunker.io is a pixelated 3D online multiplayer web game, where you have to battle against your opponents with various weapons. You play this as a first-person shooter (FPS) and you can join multiple game modes: Be the king of the hill in a free-for-all, or cooperate with teammates to win in a team deathmatch.


How to play Krunker.io?
Movement: W, A, S, D
Reload: R
Shoot: LMB
Aim: RMB
Jump: Space
Crouch: Shift
Spray/tag: F
